segments.text: Are these your text books ? Biochemistry , General Ecology , Botany , Cell Genetics , Molecular Genetics ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I gotta review all of them for the final exam . It is just around the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , right ! Do you have many exams at the end of each semester ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That depends . Some semesters have many , some don't . And some courses don't have exams but only ask for papers . That's easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And when do you prepare for your final exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honestly speaking , most students prepare it one month before the exam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? You only review your lessons in one month ? Does it work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , it's useful . And it's very crucial to have the copies of teacher's notes , because most questions in the exam are based on them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , and all the key points are included in them ? You're so smart !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the exam is not as simple as you may imagine . We have to stay up late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have the classrooms open for the whole night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , some people even pack up his bed quilt and sleep there . That's a little bit crazy .
segments.speaker: S2
